channel.title: Jucs on kensou`s notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Jucs on kensou`s notebook

item.author: kensou90@163.com (kensou)
item.description: Node Methods 需要重写的方法 tryAcquire tryRelease tryAcquireShared tryReleaseShared isHeldExclusively 不需要重写的方法 acquire 获取独占锁 用CountDownLatch来作为切入点 CountDownLatch.await() CountDownLatch.countDown()
